name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snowball.club - All-in-one X (Twitter) Growth Platform with AI and more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your X (Twitter) growth - Personalized tweet and reply AI suggestions, tweet filters and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Grow your X (Twitter) account in weeks, not years.

Create viral tweets, get instant reply ideas, maximize your engagement time with posts filters and grow your X (Twitter) account, FAST.

Snowball is the most powerful X (Twitter) growth tool available. Powered by the best available AI and a deep X UI integration.

Features*

AI powered:
- One click reply with AI that sounds like you
- Unlimited tweet ideas: forget the writer's block!
- Magic Post: 1-click personalized high-performing AI tweet generation
- Tweet auto-completion: Start typing a tweet and use AI to finish writing it
- Reply auto-completion: Start typing a reply on a tweet and use AI to finish writing it
- Edit your tweets and replies with AI (improve, rephrase, translate, fix grammar and more)
- AI Posts (AI Tweets) - Fully personalized
- Powerful engaging curated Templates - Personalized with AI or fill-in-the-blank.
- Create and re-use your own Tweet templates
- Available on X Pro (Tweetdeck)

Engagement and consistency:
- Posts Filters: Only keep the most trending tweets in your feed and filter by keywords to engage where it matters.
- Replies Filters: Makes it easy to engage under your posts --> Filter out the replies you already interacted with, automatically!
- Text formatting toolbar: Make text Bold and Italic that can be scheduled and accessible even to non-X-Premium-subscribers
- Schedule tweets directly from https://snowball.club

LinkedIn:
- Bold and Italic toolbar is now available on LinkedIn!
